alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Yakutat (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 5:59AM AKST until February 25 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW BEGINNING THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH SATURDAY... .A strengthening low will move into the NE gulf Thursday evening with an associated front moving over the panhandle Friday morning. Dry snow will begin in the Yakutat area, then spreading from north to south across the panhandle. Some uncertainty exists regarding snow totals due to limited moisture available, particularly for the northern inner channels around Haines and Skagway. For most areas the greatest snowfall rates will be Friday evening. ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 17 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...City and Borough of Yakutat. * WHEN...From noon today to 6 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult due to reduced visibility and blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light, dry, snow will fall Thursday then greatest rates expected Friday evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
